website_summaries.verdict: If getting an accurate temperature isn't enough, here's a thermometer that gives peace of mind by guiding parents on how to treat their sick children.
pros: Can use as oral, rectal, or underarm thermometer
Connects easily with smartphone of choice
Measures temps in both Fahrenheit and Celsius
Bubbles float on screen while taking temperature to entertain little ones
Cleans using a cotton cloth or swab and up to 75% alcohol
cons: While it states it can be used as a standard digital thermometer without using the app, users report it won’t work unless device is connected

customer_reviews.title: False readings cost us thousands
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this thermometer I have 16k in medical bills due to my newborn son being forced to go to ER and held for 72 hour watch because this thermometer constantly read high...it stated 100.4 F and we had no choice but to take him in. I later bought a normal thermometer and it read 1.2 degrees less which doesn't sound like much but makes a huge difference in newborns. We always just thought by the time we got to the hospital or doctors office maybe his temp just dropped slightly..but nope it was a false reading that this product gave us. We took rectal temps because they are most accurate in case people want to know.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Moore

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to track my basal body temperature, not realizing that you apparently have to have a specific BBT thermometer? Whether that's true or not, I've still been using it to track my temperature in the morning. This thermometer is very easy to use, very easy to read, and I like how it connects to the app to give you suggestions in the event you are feeling ill. You don't have to open the app just to take a temperature, which is great because it's already difficult enough to take my temperature when I'm half asleep. Anyways, I'm not sure how well it works for tracking BBT, but as a household thermometer this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: WhitMur

customer_reviews.title: this product seems like a waste of money and I’m so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product has been giving me the same temp everyday, which is impossible. Since I need to track my daily temp, this product seems like a waste of money and I’m so disappointed. The design is cool, but the rubbery tip is sort of annoying with the heavy battery end. I love that it saves the temps to an app, but I’ve been manually entering my temps using another thermometer that seems more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Highly Inaccurate Measurements +-1F.
customer_reviews.text: The result of the measurement by this thermometer depends on the temperature in the room where you switch the thermometer on. The colder the room the lower your fever. I got variations of +-1F just walking around my apartment. Can go to +-2F if you switch it on close to window in winter or under your duvet. As a body thermometer it performs unsatisfactory. However pretty decent in measuring temperature of food when it has to be close to 97F. Wrong segment of the market.
customer_reviews.author: MeL

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Although I returned this item I did so because the written instructions seemed to indicate that I needed to register it with an app and provide personal information to use it. Apparently it can be used as a stand alone thermometer, but the instructions that come with this do not make this clear. So if you buy this, be aware that you do not have to register in an app and supply personal information. I am taking a star off because this is the default setting for the thermometer and you have to disable it.
customer_reviews.author: 90Below

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The button to turn it in and off was often difficult to press and you have to hold it down at weird angles for it to turn on. Almost felt like the button had been worn out despite it being brand new. The accuracy was a ballpark estimate of your temperature at best. I would take my temp and get 98.7 one minute then get 99.9 the next then 98.4 the next minute. Super frustrating to have to rely on "well do I feel feverish??". It seemed like it would be within 1 degree accuracy but that makes a difference!
customer_reviews.author: slc

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolute GARBAGE. It gives ERR (error) message 98 out of 100 attempts. Absolute piece of *%# garbage!!!! I’m sick to death of it. Been trying it for months and the same bull*^#% “ERR” message shows up nearly every time. Absolute garbage garbage garbage. Don’t waste your money or I swear you will regret it. Heed this review or you deserve to waste your money on this junk and you remember that you read it here that you were warned!

customer_reviews.title: Great - when it works
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this thermometer but we had used it for about a couple months, maybe 10 times before it started acting up and showing an error message. Turning it on and off we'd get it to work eventually, but not a great experience when you're needing to get a temperature read quickly on a sick and fussy baby. Now, after a grand total of 6 months of use, it shows an error message more than it works, so we're finally replacing with a Vicks thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: THEJAM2016

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy we bought this! It arrived a few days prior to baby getting a big fever. Once I felt how hot she was, I used this and she was 104! The app told me to call the doctor and not wait until morning. I tested my ear thermometer on her and she was showing 102.... a very different outcome. I know that ears and rectums read differently, but not two degrees off. I then tried the ear on myself and it was all over the place. I'm so thankful that we had this as a rectal thermometer, and were able to get treatment at the hospital that night and baby was safe and happy soon after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Love how fast this is. The power button is a pain and I think it’s silly you can’t use it without downloading the app. It’s the best thermometer I’ve tried though. Update: It was 97.9 in the armpit when I didn’t have a fever so I thought it was accurate but it turns out the only readings I have gotten have been between 97.3 and 98.4. I was sure my son had a fever so I tried a different thermometer and his temperature was 100.2.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Jameson

customer_reviews.title: 8 Second Rodeo with your preemie
customer_reviews.text: Spent 37 days in the NICU and got used to using their thermometer (Welch-Allyn SureTemp). Apparently babies hate having their temperature taken. The hospital brand would take the temp in 6 seconds. This one takes it in 8 and its 200 bucks cheaper. Of course I compared the accuracy between the two and they are within 1/100th of a degree.
customer_reviews.author: Homer G.

customer_reviews.title: This is what I’m going to buy for the next baby shower love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thermometer. I love how each family member has their own profile. I love how you can input medication and dosages. I love how it gives recommendations based off symptoms and temperatures. And I love how it charts everything so you can show your doctor the trends and things you don’t even think of. I also love that it’s all in one little app. And the accuracy is based on where you tell the thermometer you’re going to take the temperature The thermometer is easy to clean And easy to use. It comes With a small plastic carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and fast readings!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer so much I bought a second one for rectal temps. It reads temperatures much quicker than another brand I have. I didn’t realize how unreliable thermometers can be until I had a kid. I asked another mom friend for recommendations and this was recommended. It works way better than a stupid forehead thermometer by another brand I bought (the forehead thermometer always said we had a fever even when we didn’t!!). This one has been really reliable
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and I love that it connects to the app and saves a record of your temperature and symptom history. This helped me during a sinus infection I had over a month ago and helped ease my fears when I was at home sick during the Covid-19 pandemic. I was able to self treat at home and feel confident that I didn't have anything more serious that required me to go into the hospitals. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer meter on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is accurate, connects to my phone, and gives a quick read. I have two, one for my diaper bag and one for the nursery. We have used this thermometer rectally on my four-month-old son since he was born so I cannot speak into oral or underarm accuracy, but rectal temp has been very accurate for us so far. I also have a temporal thermometer and hate it. From one over-cautious mom to another, GET THIS ONE! :)
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good but not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very convenient thermometer but I am not sure how accurate it is. I compared it with two other readings from two separate thermometers and this one had a higher reading by 1.5 degrees. But the convenience of the Bluetooth connection and having the readings at your finger tip is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hazarika

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY INACCURATE READINGS
customer_reviews.text: All the bells and whistles and apps in the world mean nothing if your thermometer doesn't do its primary job. This thermometer returns readings that vary by multiple degrees from one minute to the next using the exact same reading method. I compared it to two other thermometers that both read within a tenth of a degree of each other, and this one read three degrees lower. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Error
customer_reviews.text: Always gives me error, and the button to turn it on and off is very small to press and its not accurate!! I really liked the idea of the app a lot but it gives hard time to measure my kids temperature cause of the error that always makes
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I had the old Kinsa with my 3 year old. Just purchased this bluetooth one for my baby who is coming next week. It is so much easier not having a cord from the device to your phone. Gave me a result for 3 people in under 10 seconds each. The old Kinsa would glitch and freeze often this one is a breeze ao far. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie

customer_reviews.title: The Thermometer of the Future
customer_reviews.text: The new Kinsa thermometer is so much more than that. Sure, it takes your kids' temperatures correctly. But then the app also shows your child's temperature history, gives you suggestions on what to do next, along with informing you about what's going around in your neighborhood - strep? flu? - so you know what to expect. Kinsa is a must for every parent!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: You are agreeing to share your info.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little uncomfortable to share my temp info with this, but given the heat mapping this company is doing it’s also kind of interesting to participate. It doesn’t always work independently of the blue tooth connection to your internet connected device (errors out) but overall it works and is better/seems more durable than the many other thermometers we’ve run through over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Chanoochi

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thermometer. The info goes straight to the app which gives advice on what to do. Recently my baby girl's temp went up to 104 and the app told me to call the doc immediately. Which I probably would've done anyway but it was nice to have that reassurance in calling them. She was insanely hot but the docs thermometer read her temp as only 99. Their thermometer has never once confirmed a temperature I've taken at home. Anyway I highly recommend this thermometer. The app is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: We had an earlier version of this thermometer that plugged into a phones headphone jack and liked it for its ability to track the history of temperatures easily. This bluetooth model is a great upgrade. It is very fast to return a temperature and displays it on the phone in addition to the device itself. The app is the same so all of the history from the previous thermometer is still available. This is a great and so far dependable device.
customer_reviews.author: Fairlawn16

customer_reviews.title: We couldn’t love this more!
customer_reviews.text: Even better than the old Kinsa because the thermometer is now completely separate from the phone. My teens LOVE our Kinsa. It automatically records and time stamps each temp reading, allows you to enter symptoms which leads to helpful home-care tips and/or suggestions to go visit a Dr. It helps my, soon to be college bound, kid become confident, competent, and independent with his self care when sick. This in turn makes his Mom very happy that he knows how to take care of himself if I’m not there to help. I wish I had these when my kids were little! It’s a super gift for new parents. It’s kid friendly, very accurate, and has a flexible comfortable tip.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Does not display temperature
customer_reviews.text: Completely inaccurate product picture indicates an ability to check the temperature directly from the thermometer but this is not the case. Requires an app to read the temperature and can only be connected to one device. If that’s what you’re looking for, great. If you’re looking for a thermometer that displays a temperature, I suggest you keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Blue

customer_reviews.title: Buggy app doesn't connect to thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't connect to app. When I first set up the thermometer it connected without any problem, but when I went to use it a second time it wouldn't connect at all. I bought this so that I could have an app to track this without having to enter anything anywhere. And it's simply not doing it. I'm going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Vidal

customer_reviews.title: It was great until...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermometer in 9/24/2019 for my daughter when she was a newborn. I used to recommend this thermometer to every new parent I knew! Very accurate and easy to use especially with the app. I created profiles on the app for myself, my husband and our daughter. It was great until...it wasn’t. It quit working today after a little over a year. Normally I wouldn’t mind for any other product but when you need it, you need it right then! Especially when it comes to babies! I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steerfork

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer and app for homes with multiple kids!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer! I use it for my 2 big kids and have another one for my 5month old. People saying the readings are inaccurate when they have a child with the flu and are getting 105 fever readings probably should be aware that 105 fevers are very common with the flu, this thermometer has been accurate with our Dr and hospital readings when my children got the flu (temp read 105 and she was acting goofy and out of it, ran to hospital and got the same reading ). I love that the app keeps track of everyone separate temps so when the whole house goes down it's easy to keep track ! Get it !
customer_reviews.author: Jill Gia

customer_reviews.title: Shady
customer_reviews.text: You need to register with the APP and agree to essentially full permissions to even use the thermometer. It will not work otherwise. The real question is....WHY? Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Mel O

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have a smartphone, this is a nonstarter. The device doesn't feel cheaply made, is quick, and syncs up well with the free app that's required for use. I thought the app would be unnecessary, but it does provide a log. A minor perk for me, but may be more useful to people with children or those who require daily readings ongoing. Temperatures are seemingly accurate. The instructions, amazingly, are concise, easy to understand, and laid out in a decent font size. The Kinsa is considerably better than previous Vicks model I had. I would prefer my traditional mercury thermometer that broke years go and cannot be bought again. The simplest and most effective.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jay

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Thermometer Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer. It links right to my phone and keeps track of everyone in the family. It's great because it keeps all the info on file so if your child is sick you take them to the doctors and can just show them the information on the app showing what the temp was at what time and what symptoms they are having and what you treated it with. Also helps keep track of when you gave them medicine as well. Just makes life with a sick child (or adult) so much easier. I actually just bought my parents one to have for them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Best childs themometer
customer_reviews.text: I love that it stores all the information in an app and helps discern what is abnormal and correct dosages. We have bought for other families in our lives!
customer_reviews.author: Kelci C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the beginning of the Pandemic. I am glad I did as I always needed a thermometer. I lucked out not knowing it was connected to the internet via it's App. The readings are super fast and sent to the App automatically. The App in turn sends the reading to the Home company which allows them to map out hot spots in the nation, often before they appear in the CDC on the fly, so to speak.. So, great value, great, easy to use product. two thumps up.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M. Gaydos

customer_reviews.title: That the company is using this information to help our country during this pandemic.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea I was buying a smart thermometer and had never even heard of one. However, when I started using it and learning more about the company I felt I was in a very small way helping our country in the fight against disease. I take my temp each day now. Sometimes it takes a minute to turn on but it does and is very quick in giving a reading. I am not sorry this thermometer made it into my home for use during this most frightening time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Werner-hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I love how you can track the temperature per child or adult through the app. The thermometer is really fast and easy to operate. The app is great except you would be able to share between two people. I would like my wife to see the temps come up as a notification on her phone when I take a temp of one of our children. Grant it this feature is in the works and could be coming soon. There are school programs where this fun is working.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer -- but requires phone App and Privacy consent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little thermometer -- fast, easy to read, and accurate. The only downside is that you need to load a phone App for it to work, and to do that you need to consent to the vendor's privacy policy. I was not happy about that, so deducted one star.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to measure my Temperature
customer_reviews.text: Being a cancer patient I have to keep track of my vitals, including taking my temperature. Before buying the Kinsa Smart Thermometer, I used the free giveaway which took a long time to show the results. Now I have my temperature within 10 to 15 seconds, not only that, the iPhone app records my reading. It’s a great way to keep track of not only my temperature, but also possible symptoms. It is a great addition to my Smart Blood Pressure and Pulse Oximeter that measures my oxygen saturation level, or the oxygen levels in your blood. In summary a great medical device at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: EDI Guru

customer_reviews.title: Wish it didn't error out so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to a recommendation from a friend. I'm not sure if it's just the one I have or if they're all this way, but when trying to measure my toddler's temperature, if she moved her mouth at all, it would error out. It would take a few tries to get an accurate reading. I do love that you can download the Kinsa app on your phone and track temperature readings for all members of your family. It also provides recommendations for care of the fever.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product. I would have never invested in any other thermometer if I would’ve known this existed. It has so many wonderful features to track medications alarms to give medications tracking symptoms some advice. I love that you do not even have to have your phone near the thermometer to get the temperature that once you turn on the app it automatically updates. I absolutely love that it compensates for an oral or armpit temperature for the little ones. You can add several family members. This is a win win!! If you have a little once this thermometer is the only thermometer you should invest in .
customer_reviews.author: StephB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many different thermometers, that it is outrageous. I have bought 3 different forehead/ear temp ones, and they are never accurate, and don't work well. I have also bought many regular ones at Walmart. I saw this one in magazine and figured I would give it a try. I really like how, when we take the temp, it sends the info directly to my phone. The app saves the info, you can add different profiles for different people, put in symptoms etc. Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Terri M

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: After reading highly rated reviews, I ordered this thermometer to use it as a dedicated under the arm thermometer for my infant. I was hoping this would get the temperature in the ballpark to suggest a fever so in case I need to take a rectal temperature (the most accurate way for babies) I can do so based on the initial underarm reading from this. The problem is this is very inaccurate and provides inconsistent readings. Since it's very inaccurate, I can't trust it to provide ballpark temperature so I'll have to do rectal temperature every time based on tactile feel of the child. So it's useless for my desired purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all.
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate at all. 4 readings gave me temperatures between 101.5 and 103.6 ! Later I got a reading of 102.9 and I checked with two other thermometers I had at home, the highest I got was 101.8. Definitely not happy with the accuracy. The app and the concept are nice though, but the lack of accuracy makes it unusable because you cannot trust what it says. 08/26/2020 update : I contacted Kinsa and got a replacement. Still having the accuracy issues with the replacement. so definitely disappointed, this thermometer is NOT accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Rosin

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate temperature readings! Beware
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product and the first few times with our newborn I used it, I had no complaints. Easy to use, app makes it convenient to look up temperature history etc, then my 2month old got a fever and we ended up in the emergency room. This thermometer was so inconsistent in his temperature taking!!!! It gave me a 103 degree reading when he was actually 101.2 and would give me a different reading every time I used it. I wanted to love this but will stick to the more basic accurate thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: SaucyAmes

customer_reviews.title: Neat app works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the app for this even though I don't use it every time it is nice to have to track temps. It also has a cute feature to tell when temp is too high and to input symptoms. The thermometer itself is great with a silicone structure making it easier to use with a wiggly baby. I do get an error message sometimes and that is my only issue. The temp has reflected same temp as doctors office so a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects from the App constantly!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but.... it seems to disconnect from the app ALL the time.. whever I want to take a temp it rarely connects to the app on my phone..my bluetooth is always on so it should connect right up..yes it still takes a temp manually but thats not why I bought it..Im tired of fighting to get it to reconnect every I want to use it.. definitely would not purchase again..
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Not

customer_reviews.title: Super easy! Love the app!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is fantastic. It's quick (kids love) and the app tracks the temp history (parents love)! Not much more I can ask for in a thermometer. Oh - EXCEPT that the app also tracks medication so I know the last time I gave my little one some meds for their fever. I lost my first one and definitely purchased another one without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Heck

customer_reviews.title: Meant for sick people - not temperature monitoring throughout the day
customer_reviews.text: I got this to track my temperature over time, due to a thyroid issue. It does track the temperature and sync with my Apple Heath Kit app so my doctor and I can see temps over time. It appears to be accurate compared to standard thermometers and syncs easily to my phone. However, this thermometer and its app are set up to be used for sick people. It's all about symptoms and calling a doctor or nurse. I just ignore it and use it to monitor my temp throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very good when it works. Accurate reading, the app is easy to use. BUT, the quality is very poor. We bought one at May 2019, broke within a month. Got a replacement, broke last week ( about 6month). Every time I turn it on, the only message is ERR. I took the battery out and reset to the factory setting. Still the same issue. This makes us very frustrated when our kid is sick and we need to know the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Ning Xue

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, Love this Thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 different thermometers and they were all inaccurate. I had 3 kids with high fevers and needed something reliable! I took a chance with Kinsa and I'm in love. I have 5 kids all different ages, it has a setting for each kid. I love that it saves each way to take each kids temp too, for example my 19 month uses it under his arm while the rest of my kids use it under their tongue. No more guessing what the temp actually is under their arm now, kinsa gives you the correct temp for that. It's super fast and accurate what more can u ask for!
customer_reviews.author: mommy310

customer_reviews.title: Why does everything have to spy on you these days? 😞
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: The app requires Location permission! And the thermometer won't even function without an initial sync to the app*. So no matter what, Kinsa will know your physical location. *As a side note—not functioning at all without an initial sync seems potentially dangerous for a medical device. I'm disheartened that data mining was made treated as important than someone's health and will be avoiding this brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Won't work unless connected to cell phone app.
customer_reviews.text: IThe big display and long lasting Lithium battery got my attention. (Some other digital thermometers had dead batteries before I ever needed to use them.) The price is OK. However it CANNOT be used unless it is connected to the makers cellphone app. As a standalone device, it is useless. When I need to take a temperature, i don't want to deal with a dead batteries or a cellphone apps. If use of the app were optional, I might give it a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gerhart

customer_reviews.title: First good temp reader!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to sync with your phone after you’ve installed the app. I love the profiles you can create to keep track of the temperature readings. You can manually enter temp readings if you need to but it won’t be in chronological order if you decide to take a temp and decide to enter it later for whatever reason. So if you decide to enter time manually just be sure to pay mind to keep it in chronological order.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M. Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to use, useful app, small, lightweight, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, easy to use, useful app, small, lightweight, cheap. I compared with the one the nurse use, and they both give the same reading, so I think it accurate. The app is also useful since it logs the reading everytime. You don't have to use the app, but it is nice to open the app to log the reading. The app also let you know is the baby temperature is within normal range or not.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you have children.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good thermometer to have. My kid had a high fever, took his temperature and a few minutes later got an email from a nurse about medication options, symptoms to lookout for and when to reach out to a pediatrician. And, you keep track of your kids' health on the app so there's no need to write anything down. I think the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy not to have to log this all on a ...
customer_reviews.text: With a family of five, tracking meds, symptoms, notes, pictures, and temperature is much simpler, streamlined and efficient with the Kinsa! You could use a notebook, but with multiple kids, it's just easier to use the app, I'm more apt to lose the notebook than my phone. The app was simple to personalize for each family member, and there are alarms you can set for meds/doseage last taken. Overall, I'm happy not to have to log this all on a scrap paper that I'll probably lose. Super useful!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Sure, the app is cool, but I hate our Kinsa thermometer! It’s like the creator cared more about being the “fastest” than they did about being accurate. It stops reading after a few seconds whether it’s finished measuring the temperature or not (in our case it was over 3 degrees off on more than one occasion).
customer_reviews.author: Kendall_B

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer ever for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Best thermometer I ever had. My wife loves it. Specially with our 1 year old son. The app is great it gives you a suggestions according to the fever and symptoms. Extremely easy to use both the thermometer and the app. We absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: abm

customer_reviews.title: The only thermometer you’ll want to use ever again.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a fan of kinsa for a long time. Had their first smart thermometer and when Apple started taking away headphone ports was worried I’d have no way to use my Kinsa stick. Thankfully they were ahead of it and quickly produced a new solid version that was BT compatible. It’s great for the kids (quick, accurate, easy and distracting) - and I always love how it stores each of our family. A solid, inexpensive and well thought out and crafted medical device.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanMom

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: It beeps every time waking up the baby. Sometime it can read temp without starting the app, sometime it cannot. So it is not an independent and dependable thermometer. It ran out of battery relatively fast. It is not possible to turn off the light to save battery. Overall, waste of money and time. Not recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Forall

customer_reviews.title: Can ONLY use with APP and Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Probably my fault but I had no idea it ONLY works if you use an APP and Bluetooth it. I do NOT want to Bluetooth everything to an APP so it can be tracked. Totally not necessary and not what I expected. Have no idea how it works because I would not download the APP. I just ordered a normal thermometer instead.
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Seems to require a bluetooth cell phone app to use
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get it to do anything without installing the app. When I turn it on it just says "APP". The app is poorly designed. It has a conversational input style where it asks a bunch of questions, won't let you navigate anywhere or do anything else without first replying to weird conversational style text-bot questions about name, age, gender. Even once I had everything setup properly, the device was finicky and didn't easily turn back on between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Finally, an accurate thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: Most digital thermometers are annoying to use and inaccurate. This one is very accurate and consistent. (confirmed against a fairly high end thermometer I use for my reef aquarium). The app saves your temperatures and that's a bonus. The dial is also very easy to read and records temperature quickly which is nice for impatient children.
customer_reviews.author: DCpl

customer_reviews.title: Cool but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer itself is cool. Seems more accurate than the forehead one but I’ve had it for not even two months and the battery’s dead. Easy enough to find and replace but stupid to have to this soon. The app is slick but you have to think to open it before you take the temperature. It only registers if it’s open when you take it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Zier

customer_reviews.title: a great home addition...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a connected thermometer to link in with our other connected health devices and this thermometer is very good. The Kinsa App is easy to set up and it works well with Apple Health plus other health related Apps. I feel like it reads a little low but nothing to worry about from my point of view. I would def recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: I got my second pneumonia shot a week or so ago and ran a low fever afterwards. I discovered my old digital thermometer wasn’t working when I tried to take my temperature and ordered the QuickCare to replace it. Setup was very simple, and integration with Apple Health was flawless. The QuickCare instantly updated my information on my iPhone there, and all my info is now in one place. An added plus - it was cheaper than the non-connected digital thermometers at the pharmacy!
customer_reviews.author: Jael

customer_reviews.title: This has been great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thermometer and app for keeping track of temps, symptoms, and meds. So much better than trying to keep it all in my head. Only issue is sometimes the thermometer is slow to connect. I did find it very handy that you can actually still use it without connecting to the app first and I will basically save it and will automatically enter it in the profile when you open the app again. Very handy to taking temps at night when everyone is tired.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin L Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Reads too high
customer_reviews.text: Highly inaccurate junk. Reads a lot higher than other ones we have at home. When you have a newborn, it’s highly concerning to see an inaccurate high reading. Returning it now.
customer_reviews.author: Sepideh Tarighati

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on sale as I realized that we've lost both thermometers that we had. Tested it out, it works great. Easy to use, read and understand. I like the app display as it makes it easy to show medical professionals if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Domon38

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: East to use. The app is nifty, but not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and makes taking your temperature actually fun! I love how it keeps track of your readings on the app. I use it on myself and my newborn, just needed to purchase some probe covers to use it with baby. It seems to be a very quick and accurate reading. Now I can get rid of all my cheap digital thermometers!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Can only use with App
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because I couldn't find a thermometer anywhere locally and this was the only one Amazon had in stock. You can only use it with the app. First you have to create an account. I just want to take a temp, not have to hassle with logging in and what not. If you try without the APP it just says error. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: V. Woo

customer_reviews.title: Temp readings way off
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love kinsa so much. It’s easy to use and the app is great. Unfortunately it consistently reads in the mid 99’s for all 4 members of our family despite normal readings on three other oral thermometers. Sent it back twice and they all do the same thing. Customer support was ok—I had to jump through a lot of hoops to get a replacement. Now I have a third one that reads a whole degree high.
customer_reviews.author: CrustyHopduster

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Simple and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this prior to my son's birth in November- who would have guessed there would be a pandemic? So so happy with the purchase, especially when he got sick. I work as an administrative assistant in healthcare, so I'm around it just enough to be paranoid, and this provided me with confidence and peace of mind. The app is incredibly easy and useful to track his temperature, and if you don't want to use it you don't have to. We were scared of the rectal reading before but it doesn't bother us, and little boy doesn't seem to care either. 5/5 - would buy again except I don't need two thermometers.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley&Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Cannot start using it unless you download the app
customer_reviews.text: I either got a defective item or it is a useless thermometer especially with the phone connectivity. First of all you cannot start using it unless you download the app on your phone and then make the connection. It works whenever it feels like and you have to turn it off and on few times before it take the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Costi

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and fun for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit frustrated at first since you can't use it until you download the app and create an account (this is not an easy task with a fussy infant), but once it was set up it provided an accurate and quick result. It is great for my toddlers who now look forward to taking their temperatures so they can see their personalized accounts with their own avatars.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Omg, this product is adorable. I never thought I would be saying that about a thermometer but it is true. My daughter wanted to take her temp over an over agin to see the elephant on the app. It takes it so fast to the elephant is only there for like 10 sec. it super easy to set up, super easy to you and needless to say I am Amazed and so very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Reen

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer and App
customer_reviews.text: The couple times I’ve taken my kid into the pediatrician the temps were within .4 of the doctor reading. The app is very simple and I love that it maintains the history for multiple kids/adults so I can tell my pediatrician the trends when my littles are sick. I also like that the ready is quick and you can see the “time” on the app, so that helps me keep my littlest occupied as I need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby F.

customer_reviews.title: Kept showing error
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this thermometer it had great reviews. But in our time in need it just didn’t cut it. We tried using it as a recital thermometer for my 11 month old at the time and even trying it axillary would not work. It just kept showing error on the temp screen. We synced it to my phone. Just awful usability during a critical time. The features are nice that you can sync it and the tip is so soft and bendable. I think it would be better for adults or older children who can do oral temps maybe?
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Best. Thermometer. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS This might just be one of my all time fav purchases. Weirdly a thermometer, but its true! My toddler loves popping the bubbles, its easy to use and accurate. The app is awesome and can help me keep track of everyone, which is nice when multiple people are sick.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: This year's flu season has been no joke - so everyone in our family has benefited from our Kinsa thermometer. I love that you can create multiple profiles in the app to track fever/health progress over time. The slim design of the product made it far less intimidating to my 17 month old than the other bulkier thermometers we have. It seems more accurate than our old in-ear thermometer and it's definitely faster. There was almost no setup involved other than downloading the app, which was seamless.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Makes mom's life easier when kids are sick
customer_reviews.text: I love that this connects to the app and save a profile for each of my kids. It is so helpful to keep track of what time the temperature was taken and if I gave any meds at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted (less than 6 months)
customer_reviews.text: I liked the app as it keeps a record of temperatures taken, and you can have multiple user profiles to keep better track. However, it didn't work for very long. Within 6 months it started to display Err, despite replacing the battery. I've reached out to their customer service and I'm waiting to hear how they respond. Seems like this is a common issue, given the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t register accurate temp
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer doesn’t work underarm. It registers too low. It also doesn’t register accurately orally with a probe cover on it. It will register accurately orally with no cover. I had my son at the doctor and his temp was taken. I then brought him home and tried to take his temp underarm, orally with a cover and orally without a cover. It only gave an accurate temp orally without a cover. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It works so well!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned and hated many digital thermometers before this one. Most of them were inaccurate and endlessly frustrating. Not this one. It’s so easy to use. It syncs up to the app fast. Has a nice little carrying case, and it is actually accurate. I like how flexible the tip is, and it tracks my temperatures and symptoms over time, which comes in handy. I would buy this thermometer again and recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: B.A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer- Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed our lives. It is helpful and easy to opeRate even with multiple family members. I love the recommendations and support the app provides when you use it with the thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love this !!! Perfect for a newborn !!! I also bought the ear one as well for my 2 year old both are amazing ! I love how the app tells you if it’s a fever and also lets you log in medicine taken at what time and day , symtoms , when you take the temperature it also records what time and what that temperature was ! It allows you to add how ever many profiles for all family members and they each have their own profile with all the temp readings or what ever you log in for that child or even your self !
customer_reviews.author: Samantha McGuffin

customer_reviews.title: A bit annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that you have to set it up with the app in order to use it at all, and I really don't like that there's no way to turn it off after taking a temperature, meaning you have to wait for it to turn itself off before you can clean and store it. Otherwise, it is fast and seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: anonymousreader26

customer_reviews.title: Get a simpler thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Just show me the damn temperature! It says error a lot. You have to turn it off to reset it. I never use the Bluetooth feature. I should have bought a thermometer that just shows the temp.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome thermometer, helpful app
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thermometer! FINALLY one that I can actually trust the reading of! I also am very pleased with the app. It has made it so much easier to talk with our pediatrician when a kid gets sick and they want to know when the fever started and what other symptoms they have. It's all right there! I got two of them so that I never have to go searching after one gets placed in a weird spot.
customer_reviews.author: K8lin DB

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The app is a little finicky and I've had to reconnect the thermometer but it keeps all of your data so that's great. The thermometer is easy to read and comes with a little silicone zipper pouch to keep it in. And the app has a bubble pop game when it's reading but it reads so quickly you can't pop it a lot 😂
customer_reviews.author: RoxAnne

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Really accurate and easy to use. I love how quick it is and how easy it was to set up. Update. After using this almost daily (I’m in the process of being diagnosed with an autoimmune disease) this has stopped working. Half the time I turn it on there is nothing on the screen, and it flickers in and out. Sometimes if I power it off, it’ll be fine. But it’s no longer reliable. I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Manring

customer_reviews.title: Need to Change battery
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first 3 months, then it started acting up where I would have to turn off and turn on a couple of times to display screen,, and now (5 months after), it just stopped working where all I get is an error message after I try to take a temperature. Very disappointed. Update: Didn’t realize you could change the battery. Changed the battery and it works again! I would give it 5 stars if it wasn’t for the super bright screen. Too bright at night time.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Great tracking device for fevers
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to receive this but I’m glad I ordered it when I did, right at the beginning of the Covid shut down. This has a handy App to track data on your phone for all your family members. Great idea especially during this pandemic. Everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Have peace of mind when caring for your little one.
customer_reviews.text: Super useful, easy to use. The app is a breeze to understand and gives peace of mind when caring for a kid, which is invaluable. There’s the occasional Bluetooth pairing hiccup but it’s easily remedied. Strongly recommend this to any parent or any caretaker. Basically everyone should use this. The ability to track a fever as well as medication with medication reminders is incredibly helpful. The ability to export the info to another parent’s or your doctor’s phone is amazing. Can not recommend this strongly enough.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Atencio

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer worked well for a very short time. I had a very sick kid a month ago and needed to know their temperature. I continually got an Err message over and over again. Had to take them to go buy a new thermometer that worked. So frustrating and would NOT recommend! Don't waste your $$.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Hard at first but once u get the hang of it..
customer_reviews.text: Time consuming at first to open the app and turn therm. on. But once we got in a good routine of using this it has been a game changer when tracking everything. Once my daughter was taking her antibiotics and her fever at the time was extremely hard to break and we used this to track her temps and antibiotic/Tylenol/Motrin doses & it made everything so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Appollonia

customer_reviews.title: "Smart" thermometer doesn't connect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by mistake but tried to install it anyway. Gave up after an hour and returned it. This seems like a solution in search of a problem. Does one really need to operate a thermometer from a mobile phone. The IOT is going berserk. Maybe next a smart Pet Rock! lol
customer_reviews.author: John Weersing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect,easy to use,great price
customer_reviews.text: Im very grateful I was put in a order a few weeks ago. This is extremely easy to use, the app is great even giving advice and I think it's a must have for our new coronavirus reality. Hopefully they will stick more soon for anyone that needs. Stay safe everyone
customer_reviews.author: Magoo

customer_reviews.title: Quick Read - Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one and frankly they are made of bad quality. They both got bent in the middle and the rubber broke exposing the wire. Its just not worth the price for this quality. 2 of them did not even last a winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, doesn't read temperature 3 out of 10 times
customer_reviews.text: Great design for both the device and the app. Helps keep track of historical illness. I would give it 5 stars if it weren't for the fact that it fails to read the temperature many times. The word "Err" appears in the device screen. I'm a technical user so this is not a newbie mistake like Bluetooth off; either the UX is not clear or the device is faulty.
customer_reviews.author: aguspg

product_meta.title: Kinsa Smart Thermometer for Fever - Digital Medical Baby, Kid and Adult Termometro - Accurate, Fast, FDA Cleared Thermometer for Oral, Armpit or Rectal Temperature Reading - QuickCare
product_meta.description: The pediatrician-recommended Bluetooth Digital Thermometer that's as simple, accurate & reliable as other leading digital thermometers, but does much more.Kinsa QuickCare is a much-appreciated gift for adults with or without children. This smart thermometer takes accurate oral, rectal & underarm temperature readings. It keeps each family member's health details in your pocket for you or your pediatrician and offers personalized guidance on what to do if someone is sick.Kinsa works with all Android phones running 5.0 or above and all iPhones running iOS 10 or higher.Cleaning: Soft cloth or cotton swab with up to 75% alcohol. Water resistant, not waterproof The battery life is more than 600 measurements, or approximately 2 years if used every day.
feature_bullets: Kinsa QuickCare thermometer can be used without the Kinsa smartphone app but the app is required for the initial set up and for smart features
Pediatrician-recommended and FDA-cleared for adults, kids, toddlers & babies (even newborns!)
Professionally accurate and reliable oral, rectal and armpit temperature readings in 8 seconds or less
Kinsa smartphone app uses your age, fever and symptoms to help you understand how to feel better faster, when to take meds and whether to call the doctor
Keep track of your family’s health, get medicine dosage and reminders, connect to telemedicine, keep fidgety kids still during readings with Bubble game & Sesame Street mode

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
